data: `minecraft:projectile` allows the entity to be a thrown entity.

data.Name: angle_offset
data.Description: Determines the angle at which the projectile is thrown

data.Name: catch_fire
data.Description: If true, the entity hit will be set on fire

data.Name: crit_particle_on_hurt
data.Description: If true, the projectile will produce additional particles when a critical hit happens

data.Name: destroy_on_hurt
data.Description: If true, this entity will be destroyed when hit

data.Name: filter
data.Description: Entity Definitions defined here can't be hurt by the projectile

data.Name: fire_affected_by_griefing
data.Description: If true, whether the projectile causes fire is affected by the mob griefing game rule

data.Name: gravity
data.Description: The gravity applied to this entity when thrown. The higher the value, the faster the entity falls

data.Name: hit_sound
data.Description: The sound that plays when the projectile hits something

data.Name: homing
data.Description: If true, the projectile homes in to the nearest entity

data.Name: inertia
data.Description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in air

data.Name: is_dangerous
data.Description: If true, the projectile will be treated as dangerous to the players

data.Name: knockback
data.Description: If true, the projectile will knock back the entity it hits

data.Name: lightning
data.Description: If true, the entity hit will be struck by lightning

data.Name: liquid_inertia
data.Description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in water

data.Name: multiple_targets
data.Description: If true, the projectile can hit multiple entities per flight

data.Name: offset
data.Description: The offset from the entity's anchor where the projectile will spawn

data.Name: on_fire_time
data.Description: Time in seconds that the entity hit will be on fire for

data.Name: particle
data.Description: Particle to use upon collision

data.Name: potion_effect
data.Description: Defines the effect the arrow will apply to the entity it hits

data.Name: power
data.Description: Determines the velocity of the projectile

data.Name: reflect_on_hurt
data.Description: If true, this entity will be reflected back when hit

data.Name: semi_random_diff_damage
data.Description: If true, damage will be randomized based on damage and speed

data.Name: shoot_sound
data.Description: The sound that plays when the projectile is shot

data.Name: shoot_target
data.Description: If true, the projectile will be shot towards the target of the entity firing it

data.Name: should_bounce
data.Description: If true, the projectile will bounce upon hit

data.Name: splash_potion
data.Description: If true, the projectile will be treated like a splash potion

data.Name: splash_range
data.Description: Radius in blocks of the 'splash' effect

data.Name: uncertainty_base
data.Description: The base accuracy. Accuracy is determined by the formula uncertaintyBase - difficultyLevel * uncertaintyMultiplier

data.Name: uncertainty_multiplier
data.Description: Determines how much difficulty affects accuracy. Accuracy is determined by the formula uncertaintyBase - difficultyLevel * uncertaintyMultiplier
